entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -8.7°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
